sentences.english: Cook the risotto until soft, add white wine and cream cook 1 to 2 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 将意大利饭煮至软身，加入白酒和忌廉煮一至两分钟。

sentences.english: Whisk the cream with the electric mixer , set aside .
sentences.chinese: 用打蛋器将忌廉打起，备用。

sentences.english: Beat cream cheese and sour cream with electric mixer .
sentences.chinese: 将忌廉芝士及酸忌廉用电动打蛋器发打。

sentences.english: Pour fresh cream into a basin and place basin on top of bed of ice.
sentences.chinese: 将忌廉倒于盆内，然后放于冰水上。

sentences.english: Add egg and sugar into the cream cheese until smooth.
sentences.chinese: 加入蛋及糖于忌廉芝士中，打至幼滑。

sentences.english: Complete Translation (CT) and Translation Variation(TV) is a pair of notion proposed by Chinese scholar Huang Zhonglian.
sentences.chinese: 全译与变译是中国学者黄忠廉提出的一对概念。

sentences.english: Please contact with Jack Lian directly if you are interested.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有兴趣参加，请直接与活动联系人廉鹏飞联系。
